s2b

public static byte[] s2b(java.lang.String hex)
Returns byte[] from hex string. Ignores any non-hex chars. Pads extra 0 on end if odd number of hex chars.

Parameters:
hex - hex string e.g. "01ff"
Returns:
byte array. e.g. byte[] {1, 255}

s2is

Returns:

Hex dump.

Parameters:
sb - stringbuilder for result
buf - buf to dump
start - start index
len - length
indent - string for indent
lineLen - number of bytes per line (16 or 32 are good choices)
